full_summary:
# DPM P3 – Professional Business Services
=====================================

## Announcement Details

* Tender Reference Number: WS4585771784-Doc4587369887
* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: WS4585771784
* Publication Date: 2024-05-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-06-14T14:00:00

## Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-08-08
* Expected Contract End Date: No specified end date
* Contract Status: Cancelled
* Procurement Category: Service
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Requirements

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking to provide support services in the National Capital Region (NCR) on an ‘as and when requested’ basis via a Task Authorization (TA) process. The Contractor’s proposed resources must perform the tasks and meet all the deliverables required to support Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada’s (IRCC) Phase 3 (P3) of the Digital Platform Modernization (DPM) Programme in the Digital Strategy, Services and Innovation Sector (DSSI).

## Review Guidelines

Please disregard the SAP Business Network posting response closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. Unless specified otherwise in the tender opportunity, all required supporting documentation and responses must be submitted by 14:00 EDT of the RFP closing date. All responses submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the submission being declared non-responsive.

## Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Eligibility and Selection

This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under TBIPS SA EN578-170432.

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact Nguyen, Mark Nam at marknam.nguyen@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Notice URL

The tender opportunity can be accessed at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19724473?extsite=MTk3MjQ0NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19724473?extsite=MTk3MjQ0NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
